body:
Why not to do this as the other things... at top use TF_BUILD_INSTALL_EXTRA_PIP_PACKAGES=${TF_BUILD_INSTALL_EXTRA_PIP_PACKAGES:-scipy sklearn}"

It makes it clear at top what arguments it takes, what are defaults and makes the code easier to follow if things are immutable (in any language).
